column5: Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Levels confirmed on site
Acceptance Criteria - Set out in accordance with design drawings or site conditions
Verifying Document - Visual Inspection / On Site Verification
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Subgrade meets design requirements. FCR placed to specified thickness and compacted
Acceptance Criteria - No soft spots. Rock layer conforms to required thickness.
Verifying Document - Visual Inspection. Geotech test if required.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Installation of Bondek, to suit stair design
Acceptance Criteria - Bondek installed as per drawings
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Installation of stair nosing rebates, correct step heights and widths
Acceptance Criteria - Formwork confirmed with drawings
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Installation of steel mesh and or steel bar reinforcement as per drawings
Acceptance Criteria - Reinforcement installed as required
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Concrete is poured to required levels and strength
Acceptance Criteria - Strength and finish requirement met
Verifying Document - Visual inspection only Strength Test
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Stair treatments installed as required. (stair nosing’s, edge treatments, etc.)
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Inspection of works
Acceptance Criteria - Works completed to the client requirements
